A. a surgical procedure to bypass a blockage in the heart
B. a surgical procedure to bypass a blockage in the brain
C. a surgical procedure to bypass a blockage in the intestines
D. a surgical procedure to bypass a blockage in the urinary tract
E. a surgical procedure to bypass a blockage in the blood vessels
Answer: A
Explanation:
Bypass surgery is a surgical procedure to bypass a blockage in the heart.
